entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
